upload.title: Title
upload.2mb: Only one image in jpg/png format can be uploaded at a time and no more than 2MB
upload.title2: Upload your learning materials through the question set sharing platform of COURSEWHALE course at any time and anywhere to help you better understand the knowledge you have learned and build a knowledge system. Moreover,  by sharing the question  set you have created, you can help other students who are studying the same subjects and courses to communicate and share their learning experience and materials, so as to achieve twice the result with half the effort.
upload.con1: How to create a question set
upload.con2: How to use the question set
upload.con3: How to share or redeem members
upload.con1-2: The first step is to choose the school where your question bank belongs, which will help you better distinguish the similar courses in different schools. You can search the school library to select a school, and if the school you want to upload doesn't exist, you can easily create a new school.
upload.con1-4: Next, you need to choose a course for the question bank set. You can search for the course included in the school. If the course does not exist, you can easily set up a new course.
upload.con1-6: According to the format of current mainstream online courses and the classification of weekly courses, you can choose the number of weeks of courses and upload your own course materials, including but not limited to Assignments, discussion, quiz, etc. When uploading any materials, you should pay attention to protect your privacy from being disclosed.
upload.con2-2: The set of self-created question set can be found in my contribution in the personal center.  All the information you have uploaded, including school, course and question set, will be displayed here. The unreviewed information will be private. You can check the review status of the information here at any time.
upload.con2-4: You can quickly locate the question set you need by browsing the school and its curriculum. You can also search for keywords to do a site-wide search, but it will show you anything related to the keyword, so we recommend using the exact soso to find the set of questions you need.
upload.con2-5: Focus on or evaluate the question set
upload.con2-6: Because of the special structure of the question set, each user may update the question set at any time, so the best way is to follow a question bank set, so that we will inform you when there is new information uploaded to the question  set. You can also use the comment and comment system to help filter out better question sets.
upload.con3-2: After uploading the question set, it will be submitted to the administrator for manual review. Normally, the review process will last 1-3 working days. Please do not upload any content irrelevant to the course in the question bank collection. After successful approval, the question set will be open to all paying users. You can also hide your question  set at any time.
upload.con3-4: If your question set has the exact name of the school and the course, users all over the Internet can search for your question set, or you can  share the question set page directly through social media or links, so that your friends or others in need can directly access your question set.
upload.con3-6: According to the number of views, searches and comments of the question bank set you upload, all your question sets can  provide you with points continuously, which can be used to redeem the member's time or withdraw at a certain proportion, and serve as our reward mechanism for every user who is willing to share and have the spirit of dedication.
upload.con4-1: The improvement of the CourseWhale is attributed to each contributor
upload.con4-2: The core of the CourseWhale is the spirit of sharing, so we will continue to focus on and optimize the content sharing function to help more people to join the learning and sharing more easily. We will also ensure that every contributor gets the feedback they deserve, not just for the joy of helping others, but also for the practical rewards we offer to encourage everyone.
upload.con4-3: If you do not understand anything in the process of sharing the learning materials, please contact us through the question feedback in the lower right corner, or through email.
